channel.title: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform on Validated Patterns

item.title: OpenShift AI
item.description: This pattern is a starting point for using Red Hat OpenShift AI.

item.title: TravelOps
item.description: This pattern enables you to secure your applications using Red Hat Service Mesh.

item.title: HyperShift
item.description: This pattern is for deploying the Hosted Control Plane (HyperShift) service.

item.title: MLOps Fraud Detection
item.description: This pattern demonstrates how Red Hat OpenShift Data Science and MLFlow can be used together to build an end-to-end MLOps platform. It demonstrates this using a credit card fraud detection use case.

item.title: Emerging Disease Detection
item.description: This pattern is based on a demo implementation of an automated data pipeline for sepsis analysis previously developed by Red Hat.

item.title: AI Generation with LLM and RAG
item.description: This pattern demonstrates the deployment of a Chatbot application that leverages the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) in conjunction with the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework running on Red Hat OpenShift.

item.title: Retail
item.description: This pattern demonstrates a pattern that models the store side of a retail application.

item.title: Ansible Edge GitOps
item.description: This pattern uses OpenShift Virtualization to simulate an edge environment for VMs.

item.title: Multicluster DevSecOps
item.description: This pattern is derived from the multi-cloud GitOps pattern with added products to provide a complete DevSecOps workflow.

item.title: Multicloud GitOps
item.description: This pattern helps you develop and deploy applications on an open hybrid cloud in a stable, simple, and secure way.

item.title: Industrial Edge
item.description: This pattern demonstrates a horizontal solution for Industrial Edge use cases.

item.title: Medical Diagnosis
item.description: This pattern is based on a demo implementation of an automated data pipeline for chest X-ray analysis previously developed by Red Hat.

item.title: Cockroach
item.description: A multicloud pattern using cockroachdb and submariner, deployed via RHACM.

item.title: Connected Vehicle Architecture
item.description: A distributed cloud-native application that implements key aspects of a modern IoT architecture.

item.title: Kong
item.description: A pattern for Kong Gateway Control Plane and Data Plane demo.

item.title: Multicloud GitOps with Portworx Enterprise
item.description: This pattern helps you develop and deploy applications on an open hybrid cloud in a stable, simple, and secure way. It includes persistent storage for stateful applications.
